description.p: Before leaving this topic, evaluate your ability to perform each of the following tasks.

likert_series.prompt: Selecting 1 means "I could do this not at all", selecting 3 means "I could do this while relying on the course material" and selecting 5 means "I could do this perfectly on an exam."

item.prompt: I can recognize, and describe, the major differences between a competitive and uncompetitive inhibitor.
I can recognize, and describe, the activation of enzymes by allosteric compounds as a method of regulation.
I can recognize, and describe, the regulation by non-covalent and covalent modification of enzymes.
